title: Rename in API - ATTESTATION_ERROR_AGGREGATE_ALREADY_KNOWN
body:
<!--NOTE: -->
<!--- General questions should go to the discord chat instead of the issue tracker.-->

**Describe the bug**

When a validator sends an aggregate through the API whose bits are already know the API impl throws an error.

```
Eph 12/3 1.359 [VALI-2]           info: Published aggregateAndProofs slot=99, index=0, count=1
Eph 12/3 1.370 [NODE-3 NODE-3 API] error: Req req-d3 publishAggregateAndProofs error code=ATTESTATION_ERROR_AGGREGATE_ALREADY_KNOWN
Error: ATTESTATION_ERROR_AGGREGATE_ALREADY_KNOWN
    at validateGossipAggregateAndProof (/home/runner/work/lodestar/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/chain/validation/aggregateAndProof.ts:50:11)
    at map (/home/runner/work/lodestar/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/api/impl/validator/index.ts:338:17)
    at Array.map (<anonymous>)
    at Object.publishAggregateAndProofs (/home/runner/work/lodestar/lodestar/packages/lodestar/src/api/impl/validator/index.ts:335:34)
    at Object.handler (/home/runner/work/lodestar/lodestar/packages/api/src/server/utils/server.ts:70:29)
    at preHandlerCallback (/home/runner/work/lodestar/lodestar/node_modules/fastify/lib/handleRequest.js:124:28)
    at preValidationCallback (/home/runner/work/lodestar/lodestar/node_modules/fastify/lib/handleRequest.js:107:5)
    at handler (/home/runner/work/lodestar/lodestar/node_modules/fastify/lib/handleRequest.js:70:7)
    at done (/home/runner/work/lodestar/lodestar/node_modules/fastify/lib/contentTypeParser.js:151:7)
    at Parser.defaultJsonParser [as fn] (/home/runner/work/lodestar/lodestar/node_modules/fastify/lib/contentTypeParser.js:245:5)
```

**Expected behavior**

While we can consider that an error from the API consumer it's not. It is not an error to submit and object twice. The API should catch that error and just return ok.
